name: Chimaera Tech Overlord Dragon
text:
3 Tuners + "Chimaera Tech Dragon"
If this card is Synchro summoned by using a "Chimaera" Synchro monster, this card gains attack equil to the levels in your GY x200. Once Per Turn: Quick Effect you can banish 1 monster from you GY then banish all monsters on the feild whose level is lower than the banished monsters.
